title: Slow Cooker Dump and Go Cheesy Chicken
directions: Spray slow cooker with cooking spray. Place chicken breasts inside. In a medium bowl mix together soup and milk, and pour mixture over chicken. Season with salt and pepper to taste and garlic powder.
Cook on High for about 6 hours. Note: Do not lift lid while cooking!
ingredients: 2 (11 ounce) cans condensed cream of Cheddar cheese soup
